name: Soul Ring
description: A ring that resonates with the soul. Boosts all cursed energy output significantly. Crafted from the remnants of a high-grade cursed spirit.
howToObtain: Defeat the Final Boss in Nightmare Mode

name: Molten Ring
description: A ring forged in the heart of a volcano. Burns enemies on contact and enhances fire-based techniques.
howToObtain: Complete the Volcano Raid with S-Rank

name: Jade Wrist Beads
description: Beads that calm the spirit and focus energy. Used by monks for centuries to enhance meditation and cursed energy control.

name: Ninja Headband
description: Increases agility and movement speed. Worn by stealth specialists who favor hit-and-run tactics.

name: Tactful Ring
description: A simple ring that enhances technique precision. Favored by sorcerers who prioritize accuracy over raw power.

name: Silver Ring
description: Standard silver ring possessed by many sorcerers. A basic accessory that provides modest CE enhancement.

name: Cursed Amulet
description: An amulet infused with residual cursed energy from ancient battles. Passively absorbs curse energy from defeated enemies.
howToObtain: Find in the Cursed Tomb Dungeon (3% drop rate)

name: Swift Tabi Boots
description: Traditional Japanese split-toe boots enhanced with cursed energy. Allows for rapid movement and silent approaches.

name: Barrier Protection Charm
description: A protective talisman blessed by a high-grade sorcerer. Creates a temporary barrier when taking fatal damage.
howToObtain: Complete the 'Protecting the Weak' S-Rank Mission

name: Concentration Headband
description: Worn by students at Jujutsu High during training. Helps maintain focus during extended battles.

name: Berserker's Ring
description: A dangerous ring that amplifies aggressive tendencies. Increases damage but reduces defense.
